name: Timber Story
description:
A Tree has fallen and blocked the main road, luckily enough there is a kind lumberjack that could clear the fallen tree for a small favor.
Go on a mission to find and rescue the lumberjacks best friend who has gone missing deep in the woods. Can you solve the puzzles and get lumberjacks friend out of the forest?

Explore the world!

  • Explore the Forest of Timber Lake & discover magical trees & discover the effects of the wood industry.

Complete Quests!

  • Discover and complete different small fun quests given by the Lumberjack & others.

Short & Relaxing trip!

  • Take a small break from reality. Timber Story is a small happy game with toonish artstyle & cheerful music & soundscape!
